translator_notes: This is a modern collated edition produced by the online community Fuqinju (抚琴居, 'Zither-Playing Studio')
脂砚斋 (Zhiyan Zhai) was the pen name of one of the key early commentators on Dream of the Red Chamber, closely associated with the author Cao Xueqin
The term 汇校本 indicates this edition collates multiple manuscript sources to provide a comprehensive critical text
research_notes: Verified Kolistan is the handle of a prominent contributor to online Hongloumeng scholarship
Fuqinju (抚琴居) is a well-known Chinese-language online community dedicated to Dream of the Red Chamber studies
